data.name: Juan Sebastian Rios Valencia
data.Profile: Young Web developer enthusiastic about living new experiences in companies in the sector. Motivated by more and more learning from his co-workers and the problems that arise. Passionate about everything I develop and with high expectations to fulfill.

certificate.description: a web developer or engineer who works with both the front and back ends of a website or application. In this sense, they provide an end-to-end service, and can be involved in projects that involve databases and building user-facing websites.
certificate.name: Full Stack Web Development

certificate.description: Master FullStack Development in JavaScript. Develop with the PERNN Stack together with industry experts and the Platzi Engineering team.
certificate.name: Javascript School

certificate.description: The Cybersecurity Introductory Course explores the broad field of cybersecurity, specifically the importance of cybersecurity, data confidentiality, best practices for using the internet and social media safely, and potential career opportunities in this. growth field.
certificate.name: Introduction to Cyber Security

Academic.description: Analyzing and modifying existing software as well as designing, constructing and testing end-user applications that meet user needs — all through software programming languages.

set of computer science activities dedicated to the process of creating, designing, deploying and supporting software. Software itself is the set of instructions or programs that tell a computer what to do. It is independent of hardware and makes computers programmable.
